content: lion brand pattern # 40515 *clsu-shawl pdf* skill level beginner - level 1 lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* 488 yards crochet hook - size i-9 gauge 5 half-double_crochet chain 2 spaces + 8 row = 4 inches \ 10 cm worked in 1-row pattern repeat from the tip up this pattern was also distributed on ball bands for lion suede yarn some ball bands indicate that it requires 3 balls while others and the website list a requirement of 4 balls
